meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one million ohms.
meanings.sent1: The electronic device required a megohm of resistance to function properly.
meanings.sent2: The technician measured the circuit's resistance in megohms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the wire refuse to play nice with others? Because it thought it was a megohm superstar!
meanings.sent4: The old light bulb flickered and dimmed, struggling against the megohm resistance in the circuit.
meanings.sent5: The megohm stood tall like a million tiny soldiers, blocking the flow of electricity.
